summary.span: 此帮助程序基类为处理生成引擎引发的事件的记录器提供默认功能。

span.span: This helper base class provides default functionality for loggers that handle events raised by the build engine.

summary.span: 此类只能以派生形式实例化。

span.span: This class can only be instantiated in a derived form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象类提供接口的方法和属性的默认实现 。This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of the interface. 只能在派生窗体中实例化此类。This class can only be instantiated in a derived form. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写响应生成事件的基本记录器。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在派生类中重写此方法以执行初始化逻辑，并订阅发布的生成事件 。This method must be overridden in the derived class to perform initialization logic and to subscribe to build events published by . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写响应生成事件的基本记录器。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. summary.span: 获取或设置要显示在事件日志中的详细信息的级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管记录器可以随意选择它所记录的事件，但遵循详细级别准则后，会产生一致的用户体验。While a logger is free to choose the events it logs, following the verbosity guidelines creates a consistent user experience.
